projects.title: Portfolio 1
projects.description: I built a portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with integration of Bootstrap and FontAwesome for responsive design and icons. The page includes a header, a navigation bar, and two main content sections featuring articles and social media links. The layout adapts to different screen sizes, ensuring a smooth user experience across devices. Custom styles are implemented through external CSS files, and JavaScript is ready for future enhancements.
